title: Giga Manga from Google helps you draw manga art with AI
content:
Google likes to make experimental web apps from time to time, but the company introduced something a bit different on Thursday. Google is collaborating with the Japanese Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry and 12 cultural institutions across Japan on a new virtual art exhibit called Manga Out Of The Box, and part of the

The post Giga Manga from Google helps you draw manga art with AI appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Giga Manga, developed in collaboration with some of Japan's cultural institutions, uses AI to generate manga-like art from sketches.
